divs: Sighting DetailsAfter I went to bed, I looked out the window and saw a dark triangle shaped object which was almost stationary. It had round lights at each corner which were alternating between red and white. I did not get a very good look as I was viewing it through some trees. After about four minutes it left. Note that this is very similar to sightings in WV and Ohio that happened within a few days of each other.
Summary: Dark triangle with round lights at corners.
